import React from 'react' import {Fragment} from "react"; import {Dialog, Transition} from "@headlessui/react"; import {CheckIcon} from "@heroicons/react/24/outline"; import {useState} from "react"; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux"; import {setMessageOpen} from "../../state/NotificationSlice"; export const Message = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const open = useSelector(state=>state.message.open) const type = useSelector(state=>state.message.type) const title = useSelector(state=>state.message.title) return ( dispatch(setMessageOpen(true, true))}>
{/* This element is to trick the browser into centering the modal contents. */} ​
{type ? ("Success"): ("Failed")}

{title}

) }
